rdf:Description.dc:title: Mathematics 7 1996
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Distance Learning.
rdf:Description.dc:description: Accompanied by 7 Student module booklets and Assignment booklets, each with corresponding distinctive title.

Module 1. Number theory. --Module 2. Fractions and decimal numbers. --Module 3. Ratio and proportion. --Module 4. Patterns and relations. --Module 5. Integers. --Module 6. Shape and space. --Module 7. Statistics and probability.
Approved for use in Alberta schools.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Mathematics
Mathematics grade 7.
